entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK/installer infra should not install just-built linux packages in CI builds #41910
  • WindowsBase version conflict between Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App and Microsoft.NETCore.App #41909
  • Feature Request: Allow format to select only one framework in case of multi-target projects #41899
  • [NETE2ESDK][Azure Linux 3.0] Installing .NET 9 Preview SDK in Azure Linux X64 3.0 Preview should not depend on package netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 #41898
  • SDK and runtime compatibility #41893

Closed

  • dotnet-format-integration failing to format sdk #41060

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to the 8.0.6 build #41937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #41933
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #41931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #41928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #41926
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41894
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Workaround for VersionOption initializing to null on Mono. #41690
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #41913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Fix dogfood script #41903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #41914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #41915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #41917
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Switch to dSAS for internal runtimes #41918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.133 #41919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.425 #41920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.108 #41921
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.304 #41922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Set CI Job timeouts #41733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add lgpl-3.0 as allowed license #41911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust SB license and content test triggers #41831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Update .gdnbaselines to address CredScan findings #41882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Directory.Packages.props #41895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SourceBuiltSdkContainsNativeDebugSymbols for 'ilc'. #41752

  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #41694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2487276 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Error condition fix Fixes #40297 #41741
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix 15 packages to track their own versions through darc #41890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Support for Android Fast Deployment Telemetry [WIP] #41880
